page.title: 15Bonded Warehouses At Mulben
page.content: As you drive along the A95 from Keith to Mulben, you will see on your right_hand side, a number of warehouses some distance from the road. They belong to Chivas,who make Chivas Regal Whisky. There are thirty warehouses. The first two were built in 1970 and there are plans to build thirty more. The bonded warehouses site covers 81 acres. Each warehouse can store one million pounds worth of whiskey. There are three different sizes of cask for holding whisky for storing. A butt holds 500 litres and a warehouse can store 9600 butts. A hogshead holds 250 litres. 17 702 hogshead casks can be stored in a warehouse. A barrel holds 190 litres. A warehouse could hold 25 000 barrels of whisky. Each warehouse is 11 racks high.
